lead_paragraph: ALLEN--Ruth Singer, 97, beloved wife of the late Howard Allen. Loyal sister, devoted aunt, and collector of all things giraffe, died peacefully at home on May 19, 2016 after a brief illness. She embodied a zest for living and aged with vigor and grace. She is survived by her sister, Julie, her niece and nephew, Susan and Warren, their spouses, Don and Sel, three great nieces and their husbands, Tanya and Ryan, Lauren and Brett, and Rachel and Eli, and a great nephew and his wife, Brian and Jen. She is also survived by five great-great nieces and nephews and a cousin Peter. There will be a private service for the family. Contributions in her memory can be made to the Himan Brown Senior Program at the 92nd Street Y. 1/3
